comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
I installed fresh 3.3 SDK and added an existing eclipse-3.2-extension location, which has a lot of various features and plugins installed from a previous 3.2.1 installation.

I applied the changes (instead of restarting the workbench) and reset the perspective. Then, an error dialog pop up a few seconds later, stating "An internal error occurred during: "Compute launch button tooltip".

This happens every time I move my mouse cursor on top of the launch icon.



I'm not sure if these two Exceptions are really related, but it looks like they do.


More information:

this is happening because of the the 'applied changes', while the workench and perspective seem to pick up the changes that the new plugin provides, the mapping of launch group extensions is not updated (it would updated properly on a workbench restart).

If you restart the workbench does it fix the issue?

The update manager prompts for a workbench restart to ensure that all changes brought in from a new extension are properly initialized.

marking as WORKSFORME, since there is nothing debug can do.
